rules.natural: Provided that the manufacturer uses the device, the manufacturer synthesizes the substance.
Either the manufacturer uses the device or the manufacturer develops the substance.
In the event that the manufacturer develops the substance, the substance is safe.
Should the manufacturer test the substance, the substance is safe.
Either the regulator approves the substance or it is not the case that the manufacturer recalls the substance.
If it is not the case that using the device implies the substance is safe, then the manufacturer halts production.
Given that it is not the case that using the device implies the substance is safe, the manufacturer does not halt production.
Whenever it is not the case that synthesizing the substance implies testing it, the manufacturer recalls the substance.

facts.natural: It is not the case that the regulator approves the substance.

If the manufacturer synthesizes the substance, then the manufacturer tests the substance.

(A1 → A4).natural: If the manufacturer uses the device, then the manufacturer tests the substance.

(A1 → A5).natural: Provided that the manufacturer uses the device, the manufacturer synthesizes the substance.

(A1 → G).natural: Whenever the manufacturer uses the device, the substance is safe.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either the manufacturer uses the device or the manufacturer develops the substance.

(A2 → G).natural: In the event that the manufacturer develops the substance, the substance is safe.

(A4 → G).natural: Should the manufacturer test the substance, the substance is safe.

(A5 → A4).natural: If the manufacturer synthesizes the substance, then the manufacturer tests the substance.

(A7 ∨ ¬A6).natural: Either the regulator approves the substance or it is not the case that the manufacturer recalls the substance.

(¬(A1 → G) → A3).natural: If it is not the case that using the device implies the substance is safe, then the manufacturer halts production.

(¬(A1 → G) → ¬A3).natural: Given that it is not the case that using the device implies the substance is safe, the manufacturer does not halt production.

(¬(A5 → A4) → A6).natural: Whenever it is not the case that synthesizing the substance implies testing it, the manufacturer recalls the substance.

¬A6.natural: It is not the case that the manufacturer recalls the substance.

¬A7.natural: It is not the case that the regulator approves the substance.
